TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT r.PURG_RULE_ID, r.SCHEMA_NM, r.TBL_NM, x.DATAPARTITIONNAME, x.LOWVALUE, x.HIGHVALUE, ' WHERE MODEL_TYP_CD = '||SUBSTR(x.lowvalue,1,3)||' AND INV_ELIG_DT = '''||PERIOD_END_DT||'''' Where_Stmnt, PERIOD_BEGIN_DT, PERIOD_END_DT FROM (SELECT r.PURG_RULE_ID, LTRIM(RTRIM(r.SCHEMA_NM)) SCHEMA_NM, LTRIM(RTRIM(r.TBL_NM)) TBL_NM, -- Added 1 to Rtntn_nb to count Current Quarter r.RTNTN_RANGE_NB + 1 RTNTN_RANGE_NB, PERIOD_ID, PERIOD_BEGIN_DT, PERIOD_END_DT, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY p.QUARTER_ID DESC) rnk1 FROM VRAP.TDISCNT_PERIOD p, VRAP.TRBAT_PURG_RULE r WHERE QUARTER_ID < YEAR(CURRENT DATE)||'0'||QUARTER(CURRENT DATE) AND PERIOD_LEVEL = 'MONTH' AND r.TBL_NM in ('RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV','RCIT_CLM_INV_ELIG') AND CURRENT DATE BETWEEN r.PURG_RULE_EFF_TS AND COALESCE(r.PURG_RULE_EXPRN_TS,'9999-12-31') ) r, SYSCAT.DATAPARTITIONS x WHERE x.TABSCHEMA = r.SCHEMA_NM AND x.TABNAME = r.TBL_NM AND r.rnk1 = r.rtntn_range_nb AND SUBSTR(x.LOWVALUE,6,10) = TO_CHAR(r.PERIOD_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SUBSTR(x.LOWVALUE,2,1) != 'H'

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Setting the Initial Status for BCA_ARCHIVE table as "Archive Wait". After the Shell script loads the BCA_ARCHV_WRK table, the status would be made as 10 which is "Archive Ready". Then the generic Archive process will pick up this Event.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_PURG_STATUS_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: 'SELECT * FROM VRAP.RCIT_BASE_CLM_APC_ARCHIVE WHERE CLM_GID IN (SELECT CLM_GID FROM VRAP.RCIT_BASE_CLM_APC_ARCHV_WRK' ||i_WHERE_STMNT||');'
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_Sel_Stmnt

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: 'DELETE FROM VRAP.RCIT_BASE_CLM_APC_ARCHIVE WHERE CLM_GID IN (SELECT CLM_GID FROM VRAP.RCIT_BASE_CLM_APC_ARCHV_WRK' ||i_WHERE_STMNT||' AND PRCS_STUS_CD = 1);'
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: o_Del_Stmnt

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT r.PURG_RULE_ID as PURG_RULE_ID, r.SCHEMA_NM as SCHEMA_NM, r.TBL_NM as TBL_NM FROM VRAP.TRBAT_PURG_RULE r WHERE CURRENT DATE BETWEEN r.PURG_RULE_EFF_TS AND COALESCE(r.PURG_RULE_EXPRN_TS,'9999-12-31') AND r.TBL_STRTR_CD = 2 AND r.ARCHV_IN = 1

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: NOTE that this source object is the same name as one in RPSDM, therefore in the Informatica code it must have _GDX after it, even though the database object itself does not have _GDX.
SHORTCUT.NAME: TRBAT_PURG_RULE

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: NOTE that this target object is the same name as one in RPSDM, therefore in the Informatica code it must have _GDX after it, even though the database object itself does not have _GDX.
SHORTCUT.NAME: TRBAT_PURG_EVNT
